name: vibe-starter
description: Rust + React 全栈入门脚手架

scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && FRONTEND_PORT=3000 BACKEND_PORT=3333 npm run dev
scripts.backend:dev: DATABASE_URL=sqlite://./vibe-starter.db BACKEND_PORT=3333 cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'
scripts.generate-types:check: npm run generate-types && git diff --exit-code shared/types.ts
scripts.check: cargo check && cd frontend && npm run check
